short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the realtime delay before the next RTC bus arrives.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly get the RTC Nomade realtime information for your saved routes directly in your browser!

With this extension, you can add as many RTC routes you want and get the realtime delay before arrival right into your chrome, without leaving what you're doing. Chrome sync is supported and french localization is available!

The extension is free and will remain like this but donations are always welcome! https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/jebeaudet

The extension is also open source, contributions are welcome. If you have any issues or feature request, open an issue on Github https://github.com/jebeaudet/ChRomeTC.
